scripts.prisma: cd packages/shared && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && cd ../..
scripts.prisma:studio: cd packages/shared && npx prisma studio && cd ../..
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd packages/shared && npx prisma migrate dev && cd ../..
scripts.backend:dev: cd apps/backend && npm run start:dev && cd ../..
scripts.frontend:dev: cd apps/frontend && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.backend:build: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.frontend:build: cd apps/frontend && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.backend:start: cd apps/backend && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.frontend:start: cd apps/frontend && npm run start && cd ../..
